data.text: @tonygood2 Hi, our time to answer is taking more time due to the high number of calls received. We can assist you by this means. Please send us the details through DM. We'll be waiting your message. Regards.
@charlieppr7773 Hola, en un DM indícanos cómo te podemos ayudar.
@jrpmendes Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@mauricio_loumi Hi, we are worried about your comment, please send us further information via DM. In case you have a booking code or ticket number, send it too. Regards.
@jenikg17 Hi, we don't flight from/to Venezuela. You can know our routes by quoting here: https://t.co/BHrL3ObY4U. Regards.
@miquele2009 Hi, please send us a DM with your full name, frequent flyer number, country of residence, phone number and email address. Regards.
If you believe money is owed to you by LATAM, you have until December 18th, 2020 to file a claim in the chapter 11 bankruptcy. https://t.co/AOAEPE747s https://t.co/P7qPqMAjPR
@carlosarias10 Please send us a DM with the specific dates to check our availability.
@tianmeneses1 Hello, please send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM. Regards.
@carlosarias10 Hi, it hasn't been reported to be down. We suggest eliminating the cookies and history in your browser because it may affect the correct functioning of our website. Regards.
@beendoingokayig Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.

data.text: @SolidVega @bbb_us @FAANews @Flight_Refunds We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@Marcossaieg Marcos, te contactaremos a la brevedad posible para entregarte la solución de tu caso. Por favor mantente atento a tus medios de contacto. Saludos.
@Marcossaieg Marcos, nos estaremos comunicando con mayor detalle de tu caso, vía correo electrónico. Agradecemos tu comprensión.
@andrezamoraisjj Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@lizgrojas We've replied through DM, regards.
@lizgrojas We've replied through DM, regards.
@lizgrojas Hi, we sent you a DM. Thanks.
@AndreRossler1 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@lizgrojas We've sent you a response by DM. Regards.
@lizgrojas Please send us your full name and booking code by inbox to see what we can do.

@lizgrojas Hi, our website can be affected by cookies, cache and history. We suggest deleting them or try to do the process by using another browser or mobile device. We'll be aware of further requests or inquiries. Regards.
@tj_man20 Hola, te enviamos  un DM. Gracias.
@thesamhernandez Hi, send us through DM the ticket number, booking code and full name of the passenger in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@itscharliecrown To check if there's any issue with your booking, send us a DM with your booking code and your full name.
@itscharliecrown Hi, no issues have been reported. Try eliminating the cookies and history from your browser, as well as using a different device. Regards.
@omosblack We've replied through DM, regards.
@omosblack Hi, we sent you a DM.
@omosblack Hi, we sent you a DM. Regards.

@omosblack Hi, through this means we can check the information, please provide via DM, the booking or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@FioreMastrangel Hi, we sent you more information through a DM. Regards.

data.text: We’re committed to South America, so our Solidarity Plane has been flying to support San Andrés and Providencia archipelago, delivering more than 70 tons of humanitarian aid because of hurricane IOTA. Join this cause. The Archipelago needs us! @ProArchipielago https://t.co/E7d1uTcCnP
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Hi, as soon as your request is complete, we'll get in touch with you through your email to notify it. Regards.

data.text: @FrankieFibo Hi, you can check the conditions to travel here: https://t.co/0n0z54rtx9. Regards.
@JSS779 Hi, please send us a DM with the name of the passenger, dates of travel and email address. Regards.

@jetsetterma Hi, you can make the purchase one more time, this time deleting cookies, history, cache or using another browser or mobile device. If the inconvenience persists, you can call us through the number 1 866 435 9526. It'd be subject to a service fee. Regards.

urls.title: Cheap flights with LATAM Airlines USA | Official Site
urls.description: Take advantage of the incredible discounts and flight deals offered by LATAM Airlines. Book your trip now and enjoy the best experience

data.text: @cucho_oficial Hi, yes, Black Friday is coming soon. We suggest being aware of our website: https://t.co/8pkSFljezM and our official social networks. Regards.

@Anto46042827 Hello, direct flights may not always be available as this varies; also, if the flight is cancelled, you can contact us to request a refund, which is now processed as a Travel Voucher that you can redeem for LATAM services or as a bank transfer. Regards.

data.text: @Anto46042827 Hi, we don't have the restriction you mentioned; and you can travel with kids but depending on your destination, additional documents may be needed. Remember that blocking the middle seat as a measure of social distancing is not advised by IATA to ensure a safe flight. Regards.

@Cassandrita05 Hi, in order to check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@homeroomtravel Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@imkhris We've sent you a response by DM. Regards.
@manuelbcosta Please send us your travel voucher number and full name by DM. We'll check its status. We'll be waiting for your message.

@carlosarias10 Hi, to check it and assist you please send us your ticket number or booking code alongside your passport number and the country it was issued by DM. We'll be waiting for your message. Regards.
@manuelbcosta Hi, try eliminating the cookies and history in your browser, because that may affect the functioning of our website. Regards.
@Abertolino2602 Hi, to check your information, send us your booking code through a DM. Regards.
@beezwitit We sent you a DM. Regards.
@beezwitit Hi, please send us a DM with your ticket or Travel Voucher number and your full name to check the status of the request. We'll stay tuned.
@FioreMastrangel Hi, we have sent a message through DM. Regards.
@bbiraa Hi, stay tuned to your email, you will receive more information there. Regards.
@adn_roy We requested the booking code and your full name through a DM. That way, we can look into that issue. Regards.
@adn_roy Hi, send us your booking code and full name through a DM to verify the information. Regards.
@cnsamp Hi, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@83Roodster We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@83Roodster Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.

urls.title: Pets transportation service | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Travel with your pet and continue creating memories together. Take it in the cabin or checked, and know the conditions to do it.

data.text: @wolverine68 Hi, you can find the requirements to travel with your cat here: https://t.co/nw300giek5. Regards.
@tj_man20 We replied to your DM with more information. Regards.
@tj_man20 Hi, let us know more details about your case through DM in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@RomanDanney Hola, por favor envíanos un DM con tu número de ticket. Saludos.
If you believe money is owed to you by LATAM, you have until December 18th, 2020 to file a claim in the chapter 11 bankruptcy. https://t.co/AOAEPE747s https://t.co/3D3nwR6F6e
@erictheislesfan Hello, please send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM. Regards.
@CressBost Hello, we sent you a DM.
@adn_roy Hi, to check your request, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@CressBost Hello, please send us a DM with your reservation code, ticket number and more details about your request. Thank you.
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Hi, your transfers are still in process and as soon as we get an update we will let you know through your email.
@imkhris We have sent you a message via DM. Regards.
@imkhris Hi, in order to provide you further assistance, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and your complete name. We will await for your reply.
@RodHuertaDC Hola, para mayor detalle bríndanos vía DM, tu código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 números) y nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@bbiraa We replied to your DM. Regards.
@bbiraa Hi, send us your booking code or case number through a DM along with the full name of passenger to verify the situation. Regards.
@romibeautyblog Enviamos un mensaje vía DM. Saludos.

#AttentionPassengers. We are with high demand in our Customer Service channels. To save time, please go to https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp, where you can find answers to documentation requirements and routes that we are operating, among other topics.
@ronildo Hi, please send us a DM with the name of the passenger, route, dates of travel and email entered during the purchase. We will verify if a booking was created. Regards.
@gdawson03 Hi, if you have a claim with us, send us a DM with its number, your email address, and full name. We'll stay tuned.
@ccedacero Hello, send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM, in order to provide more information. Regards.
@Reportista Hi, we sent you a DM. Thanks.
@Rafadelos Hola, te hemos brindado respuesta vía DM. Saludos.
@vinifortuna Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@MarckiMatos Hi, please send us a DM with the name of the passengers and dates of travel. Regards.
@BillyGriffithsM Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and case number. Regards.

@JuanAnd34737299 Hola, por favor envíanos los siguientes datos vía DM: nombre completo, fechas, rutas, número de documento de identificación registrado y correo electrónico registrado. Asimismo, indícanos el medio por el cual compraste tu pasaje. Quedamos atentos.
@ilanagr Hello, please send us the case number via DM. We will wait for your reply.
@PamelaBermudez0 We sent you a private message. Regards.
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Hi, your bank transfer is in process. We apologize for the delay due to the high volume of requests. Regards.
@KarinTaps Hi, as soon as we have an update, we'll get in touch with you through your email. Regards.
@MarciaSolV Hi, check the information here: https://t.co/Bp1th0GhhS, for more details, contact the consulate of the country of destination. Regards.
@linneajanae Hi, send us your ticket number or Travel Voucher number through a DM to verify the status of your request. Regards.
@matiasly Gracias a ti por escribirnos. Saludos.

data.text: @matiasly Hola, a través de este enlace: https://t.co/BcmElfhQ5W, podrás revisar nuestras rutas operativas; y podrás cotizar/comprar tus pasajes, aquí: https://t.co/U5Wp8z5AFp. Saludos.
@PamelaBermudez0 We have sent you a DM. Regards.

data.text: Our international flights to Peru have resumed, so when you are ready, we are ready. Connect in Lima with the largest network of destinations in Peru and South America; always with the safety and flexibility of our #NewWaysToFly. For more information visit https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv https://t.co/9rcuyADJQ6

@JuanAnd34737299 Juan, no obtenemos información de tu reserva. Si realizaste la compra con nosotros, ten presente que la confirmación es enviada a tu correo electrónico. De igual manera, envíanos vía DM la captura de pantalla del pago y fecha en la que efectuaste la comprada. Quedamos atentos.

data.text: @Steve801 Hello, you can request more information about this using the link in this post; if you prefer to call us, please use the following phone number (free): (877) 606-3609 (USA). Regards.
@JuanAnd34737299 Hola, por favor envíanos tu número de ticket o código de reserva vía DM. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@nando_c Hi, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@HannahK44853847 We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@PamelaBermudez0 Please send us a DM with her booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and her full name, to check it and tell you her options. We'll stay tuned.
@fredcfreitas1 We understand your position, please wait for our contact. Regards.
@feliperomerap The ticket was issued by a travel agency. Therefore, you'll have to call them for assistance with the refund. Regards.
@HannahK44853847 Hello, please send us a DM with your reservation code, ticket number and name of the passenger. Regards.
